import type { Assign } from '@ark-ui/vue'
import { SignaturePad } from '@ark-ui/vue/signature-pad'
import { signaturePad } from 'styled-system/recipes'
import type { HTMLStyledProps } from 'styled-system/types'
import type { Component } from 'vue'
import { createStyleContext } from '~/lib/create-style-context'

const { withProvider, withContext } = createStyleContext(signaturePad)

export type RootProviderProps = Component<typeof RootProvider>
export const RootProvider = withProvider<
  Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, SignaturePad.RootProviderBaseProps>
>(SignaturePad.RootProvider, 'root')

export type RootProps = Component<typeof Root>
export const Root = withProvider<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, SignaturePad.RootBaseProps>>(
  SignaturePad.Root,
  'root',
)

export type ClearTriggerProps = Component<typeof ClearTrigger>
export const ClearTrigger = withContext<
  Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'button'>, SignaturePad.ClearTriggerBaseProps>
>(SignaturePad.ClearTrigger, 'clearTrigger')

export type ControlProps = Component<typeof Control>
export const Control = withContext<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, SignaturePad.ControlBaseProps>>(
  SignaturePad.Control,
  'control',
)

export type GuideProps = Component<typeof Guide>
export const Guide = withContext<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, SignaturePad.GuideBaseProps>>(
  SignaturePad.Guide,
  'guide',
)

export type LabelProps = Component<typeof Label>
export const Label = withContext<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'label'>, SignaturePad.LabelBaseProps>>(
  SignaturePad.Label,
  'label',
)

export type SegmentProps = Component<typeof Segment>
export const Segment = withContext<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'svg'>, SignaturePad.SegmentBaseProps>>(
  SignaturePad.Segment,
  'segment',
)

export {
  SignaturePadContext as Context,
  type SignaturePadContextProps as ContextProps,
} from '@ark-ui/vue/signature-pad'
